reg_pit.acttitle: Farming and Fishing Industries Development Act
reg_pit.title: Cattle Industry Development Council Regulation

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "council" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 154/2017, effective July 28, 2017.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: council means the Cattle Industry Development Council continued as a council under section 6.1 (a) (ii)1 of the Act;

change.changenote: Section 6 (2) (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 193/2011, effective November 4, 2011.

paragraph.paragraphtext: on or before March 31, 2012, any payment that has been made by the council from the levy to the National Beef Research, Market Development and Promotion Agency.

change.changenote: Section 6 (2) (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 112/2017, effective April 1, 2017.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: on or before March 31, 2017, any payment that has been made by the council from the levy to the National Beef Research, Market Development and Promotion Agency.
